statements: UPDATE protein_secondary_structure SET secondary_structure = 'Helix' WHERE protein_id = 1;

UPDATE protein_information SET sequence = 'MVKVYLKLQTTELLSEYDPETACVPSLLDAGXTFTVQLVLEEAPDNVKAIISDLKKTKTLVESHTQQAAAESRPGKSPLVKLFSLSDKXXXVIASNEPSVHEKMQYLWRSTGPSKLNVTGFWWKRGYVGGISRAITAL','secondary_structure' = 'Helix' WHERE protein_id = 1;

UPDATE secondary_structures SET structure_type = 'Helix' WHERE protein_id = 2 AND start_position = 10;
